company.description: Valid edge types for company entities

edge_types.description: Person serves as an officer of the company
Entity is a beneficial owner of the company
Entity is an owner of a company or asset
Company is a subsidiary of another company
Company is the legal parent of another company
Entity is a shareholder of the company

edge_types.ftm_divergence: FTM stores phone as LegalEntity property, not relationship
FTM stores email as LegalEntity property, not relationship
FTM stores address as LegalEntity property or uses Address entity

edge_types.description: Company owns another company or asset
Company is a subsidiary of parent company

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Maps to Sanction if sanction-related, else custom
Use Address entity with LegalEntity.address property
Use jurisdiction property on LegalEntity
FTM stores website as LegalEntity property
FTM stores social links as LegalEntity property
Use Document.mentionedEntity or custom
Maps to CourtCase/CourtCaseParty

person.description: Valid edge types for person entities

edge_types.description: Person has a phone number (mobile, work, home, etc.)

primary.description: Is this the primary phone number

edge_types.ftm_divergence: FTM stores phone as LegalEntity property, not relationship
FTM stores email as LegalEntity property, not relationship
FTM stores address as LegalEntity property or uses Address entity

edge_types.description: Person is child of another person

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Maps to Sanction if sanction-related, else custom
Use Address entity with Person.address property
FTM stores social links as LegalEntity property
FTM stores social links as LegalEntity property
Use Document.mentionedEntity or custom
FTM stores education as Person property

document.description: Valid edge types for documents and filings

edge_types.description: Document or filing submitted to an agency
edge_types.ftm_divergence: Custom, document filing relationship

edge_types.description: Document references or involves this entity
Generic association between entities discovered via OSINT
Entity has a profile at a specific URL
Entity is documented by a specific source URL/document
edge_types.ftm_divergence: Custom, document references entity

vessel.description: Valid edge types for vessel/ship entities

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Use jurisdiction property on LegalEntity
Use Asset.owner or custom
Maps to Sanction if sanction-related, else custom

plane.description: Valid edge types for aircraft/airplane entities

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Use jurisdiction property on LegalEntity
Use Asset.owner or custom

vehicle.description: Valid edge types for vehicle entities (cars, trucks, motorcycles)

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Use Asset.owner property

asset.description: Valid edge types for generic asset entities (property, intellectual property, etc.)

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Use address property on entity
Use jurisdiction property on LegalEntity

organization.description: Valid edge types for organization entities (non-profits, NGOs, agencies)

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Use address property on entity
Custom relationship, no direct FTM equivalent

address.description: Valid edge types for address/location entities

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Reverse of has_address, use address lookup
Use country/jurisdiction property on entity

watcher.description: Valid edge types for watcher entities

edge_types.description: Watcher execution is guided by context from this node

domain.description: Valid edge types for domain/website entities

edge_types.description: Domain/URL links to another domain/URL (backlink when reversed)

link_count.description: Number of links from source to target

edge_types.ftm_divergence: Custom link intelligence relationship

edge_types.description: Domain is a subdomain of parent domain
Domains share the same tracking code (GA, GTM, etc.)
Entity is the registrant of the domain (from WHOIS)
edge_types.ftm_divergence: Custom domain ownership relationship

edge_types.description: Domain is hosted at IP address
Specific event/topic is an instance of a generic registry node
Event/topic is anchored to a coordinate node (temporal/physical/virtual/meta)
Subject/entity/coordinate was extracted from a source
Topic escalated into an event (pressure  explosion)
Event resulted in a topic (explosion  fallout)
Event is preceded by another event (timeline ordering)
Event is followed by another event (timeline ordering)

project.description: Valid edge types for project/narrative container nodes

edge_types.description: Node is a member of this project graph
Project has collected this node as evidence
